name: Shapes n' Falls
description:
You're a triangle in freefall who has to get to the other side of the map, but beware of the red shapes, because they can kill you. There, your gravity will shift, the red hexagons will turn green, you must collect them all. But not only they changed, all blue circles are now red, you must be careful.

There are 3 levels you will have to traverse, good luck!

Controls:
  • Move: W/S - Arrow Keys
  • Pause: Esc - P
  • Restart: R
  • Jam 3rd Challenge: aXRhbGlj

Menu music by Xythe

Submission to VimJam. Focus: Collectables. Theme: There and Back
